remarks: Hilbert space scalar multiplication associative law.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlmulf.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hlmulf.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
hlmulass $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A x. B ) S C ) = ( A S ( B S C ) ) ) $.
